com.faltro.houdoku.controller

Class ConfigController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faltro.houdoku.controller.Controller
      • com.faltro.houdoku.controller.ConfigController

  • public class ConfigController
extends Controller
    The controller for the config page.

    The FXML file for this view is at resources/fxml/config.fxml

    See Also:
    Controller
